headline: Is Enphase Energy (ENPH) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Enphase Energy's current share price still reflects its long term potential, you are not alone. This article will focus squarely on what the numbers say about value. Over the short term, the stock has returned 15.7% over 7 days, 21.0% over 30 days and 18.3% year to date, while the 1 year, 3 year and 5 year returns of 35.8%, 82.0% and 79.3% declines paint a very different picture. Recent news coverage around Enphase Energy has largely centred on the company as a...

headline: Enphase Energy shares feedback from programs focused on solar system design
summary: Enphase Energy (ENPH) shared feedback from firefighters who participated in Solar and Fire Education training programs focused on modern solar system design and emergency response considerations. In post-training surveys, more than 98% of participating firefighters indicated they would recommend microinverter-based solar energy systems, based on their understanding of system design and safety characteristics. The survey results reflect feedback from hundreds of firefighters across multiple U.S.
